cloud_landing.banner_title: The best web hosting service for your website.
cloud_landing.banner_subtitle: Web hosting made easy & affordable! FREE Get Your Domain On! 1 Year Domain Registration on Shared Annual Plans
cloud_landing.mainfeature_title: All you need to grow online.
cloud_landing.mainfeature_descitem1: Perfect domain name allows you to present your brand in the best light.
cloud_landing.mainfeature_descitem2: Our powerful, reliable web hosting backs your site on a stable & secure platform.
cloud_landing.mainfeature_descitem3: 24/7/365 Premium Support via Phone, Live Chat and Online Support Portal.
cloud_landing.morefeature_desc1: With industry-leading load times, guaranteed 99.9% uptime and expert, 24/7 support, your site couldn’t ask for more.
cloud_landing.morefeature_desc2: Deploy to any of our data center locations – New York, SF, London, Amsterdam, Bangalore, and more.
cloud_landing.morefeature_desc3: View summary stats and time series graphs of resource usage for your Kubernetes cluster, database, or individual Droplet nodes.
